statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -10 \\ -1 \\ 11 \\ -11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -12 \\ -4 \\ 9 \\ -16 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
